thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 13 of 1869
thread.title: GEORGES

author: GEORGES
title: GEORGES
text:
Flighthub.com is excellent, and convenient website, they provided me of too many choices, of my multiple city flights .
So I have had gotten the best price, routes, and shortest time possible for my flight.
The only one thing flight hub has to improve is, their customer service in the Philippines, because the staff in that country aren't knowledgeable and their English, is not qualify to serve north American countries.
